title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for answer with reason

g''(x)=f'(x) changes sign only at x=0. Thus the graph of g has a point of inflection at x=0.
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for answer with reason

g''(x)=f'(x) changes sign only at x=0. Thus the graph of g has a point of inflection at x=0.
